publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1456# Mark Ballard: Congratulations to Scottish Nappy Company for Winning a Scottish Business in the Community Award-That the Parliament notes that the Scottish Nappy Company was presented with an Award for Excellence at the Scottish Business in the Community celebration dinner on 3 June 2004; commends the excellent service that companies like the Scottish Nappy Company offer to parents in Scotland who are seeking an uncomplicated and inexpensive means to reuse cotton nappies; recognises that, on average, 60% of a disposable nappy is non-biodegradable and that their usage creates 1,000,000 tonnes of waste in Great Britain every year, much of it ending up in landfill, and recognises that reusable cotton nappies provide a practical and environmentally-sustainable alternative to disposable nappies.
